properties.description: We're really pleased to be opening as a warm spot on Monday afternoons in November, December and January. The team have been preparing the Discovery Room to make it nice and cosy. Pop in, we'd love to see you. We'll be offering free tea, coffee, hot chocolate and biscuits on Mondays 1pm-3pmAlso, phone charging, second handbooks and make Christmas crafts. We'll be open 28 November, 5,12,19 December and 2, 9, 16, 23, 30 January.
properties.title: National Trust - Wordsworth House and Garden, Cockermouth

properties.description: The Northern Fells Group is organising drop-ins for anyone to enjoy a complimentary cuppa, or soup and a roll and have a chat, play board games or read the paper. There will also be the chance to view a classic film, provided by Caldbeck Film Club, where possible.The idea is to offer people a warm and child-friendly place to spend time and relaxTransport can be arranged, contact Shaun in advance
